Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= king of Egypt

= king of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) who defeated king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) of Judah (יְהוּדָה) who wanted to keep him from helping the Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) in their battle against Nebuchadnezzar (נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר) king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= river, usually identified with the Euphrates; ◄ running through Mesopotamia; ► one of the four rivers flowing from the garden of Eden (עֵדֶן)
= town; ◄ on the Euphrates (פְּרָת) ► location where Nebuchadnezzar (נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר) defeated the Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) and the Egyptians (מִצְרַיִם)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) from 605 562 B.C. who led the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה) into exile
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range

= man, also known as Eliakim (אֶלְיָקִים) ◄ son of Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah (609 597), appointed by Pharaoh Necoh (נְכֹה) who changed his name from Eliakim to Jehoiakim
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Amon (אָמֹון) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (ca. 640 609)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God

= a large, long, oblong object, about the height of a man, made of wood, metal, leather stretched over wood, or even plaited strips of wood or reeds, and used to protect the entire body against the weapons of the opponent; certain officers made use of shield bearers to carry it for them when they were not using it

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= to fit an animal with a set of straps around its head ► so that one can ride it

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= soldier riding a horse
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= head covering; ◄ made of metal; ► used by soldiers for protection
literally: to rub; hence: = causative action by which someone causes a metal object to reflect light by rubbing it vigorously
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= action by which humans put on clothes or ornaments
= upper body covering; ◄ made of metal rings joined together to form a flexible unit; ► used by soldiers for protection

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state of lacking inner strength and courage

= pertaining to a movement in a direction away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was facing the East, the term is also often used to denote the West; also associated with failure, unfaithfulness, and outright rebellion
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= causative action by which an army gains the upper hand over an opposing army with a total victory
= state in which humans experience a strong fear that certain things might happen to them
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= river, usually identified with the Euphrates; ◄ running through Mesopotamia; ► one of the four rivers flowing from the garden of Eden (עֵדֶן)
= process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= flowing body of water

Node.gloss: to shake|to toss about|to be turbulent|to stagger
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects move up and down or to and fro
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= flowing body of water

Node.gloss: to shake|to toss about|to be turbulent|to stagger
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects move up and down or to and fro

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

Node.gloss: to rage|to charge madly|to dash wildly
Node.definition: = action by which vehicles move at a larger speed than is considered responsible, ≈ which is associated with insane behavior
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= ethnic group and their territory, ◄ regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)
= ethnic group; ◄ regarded as descendants of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ)

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in northern Africa; regarded as descendants of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) son of Ham (חָם) ► often fighting in Egyptian army
= causative action by which humans bend a bow (קֶשֶׁת) by drawing its string towards them ► in order to shoot an arrow
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong and so find relief from their anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= river, usually identified with the Euphrates; ◄ running through Mesopotamia; ► one of the four rivers flowing from the garden of Eden (עֵדֶן)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

= dried resin produced by the liquidambar or lentisk terebinth tree; the sticky gray brown gum is obtained by making cuts in the trunk of the tree; ► aromatic and medicinal, and highly valued in trade with Egypt
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment
= process with which a disease or wound is restored to health or wellness

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state which provokes disdain from the general public or from a specific category of people ◄ due to one's behavior or condition
= process of crying out loud ◄ caused either by joy or by grief ► in order to give vent to one's feelings
= state or process by which a location is dominated by a certain event, to the extent that it dominates everything else, ◄ as if it were completely filled with that event

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) from 605 562 B.C. who led the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה) into exile
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= location; ◄ in eastern Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) near the Sea of Reeds (יָם־סוּף) ► close to Pi Hahiroth (פִּי הַחִירֹת) where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped before crossing the Sea of Reeds on their way from Egypt to Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= town, also known as Memphis; ◄ in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► residence and capital of many of its kings (ABD)
= town; ◄ Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) on eastern edge of Nile (יְאֹר) delta

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= action where humans make themselves ready for a particular activity
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= sacred bull of Egyptians
= epithet for Apis, a deity shaped like a bull, ◄ worshiped by Egyptians|= powerful person
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans give other humans a violent shove
= process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the community where a person was born and grew up
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= king of Egypt
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= process by which humans produce loud sounds, either as individuals or groups, in order to give expression to aggression, revelry, or excessive pride
= a fixed point in time for a particular event

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= mountain, ◄ located in the territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ◄ located in north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) overlooking the Mediterranean Sea
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= town, also known as Memphis; ◄ in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► residence and capital of many of its kings (ABD)
= state/process by which objects are totally damaged by the hands of humans and so be unfit for human use

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= female young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as sacrifice

m.definition: see יְפֵה־פִיָּה (יְפֵה־פִיָּה)|= state in which the outward appearance of animals is pleasing to the eye

Node.definition: = nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= type of fly, ◄ |iStomoxys calcitrans|i*, ► which feeds on the blood of humans and warm blooded animals; very persistent and will not leave its host unless brushed or knocked away; some carry diseases; ≈ associated with trouble and persistence
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= a person who has made himself available to be of service to others for a limited amount of time and in return for payment; who is usually paid daily, and his fragile rights are protected by the law; ≈ often used in metaphors expressing short and limited periods of time
= male young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained
= construction ► where domestic animals are kept permanently with the purpose of fattening them

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= extremely difficult circumstances ► resulting in grief, poverty, sickness, and/or death
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= long legless reptile without eyelids or external ears; it moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; ≈ symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= wooden handle with a metal blade, sharpened on one face, perpendicular to the handle; ► used for cutting down trees and shaping timber
= causative action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or a similar sharp tool ► in order to cut it down or alter its shape
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to look for|to try out|to test|to search out|to explore|to investigate|to examine|to cross examine|to sound out|to determine
Node.definition: = action by which someone tries to obtain information about a certain object, person, or event by examining it carefully
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency

= six legged, winged insect that is characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; insects of this type move in swarms at certain periods and migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times they live either solitary or in small groups; ◄ Acrididae family; ► normally eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, that may be eaten

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: there is no counting (of it); hence: = state in which objects cannot be counted or measured because of their abundance

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= deity; ◄ Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)
= town, commonly known as Thebes; ◄ located in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► center of worship of Amon (אָמֹון)
= king of Egypt
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= king of Egypt
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) from 605 562 B.C. who led the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה) into exile
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= referent to the time after the event in focus
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

Node.gloss: to fear|to be afraid|to be discouraged
Node.definition: = state in which humans or animals lack inner strength and courage

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be at ease|to be calm
Node.definition: = state in which humans feel confident and calm ◄ either because living under favorable circumstances or because of lack of fear when living under difficult circumstances

Node.gloss: to be at ease|to be secure
Node.definition: = state in which humans live a peaceful life and have nothing to fear

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans inspire a strong fear in (other) humans or animals, ► resulting in panic
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= literally: finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to drive out|to cast out|to disperse
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to leave their place or position using force

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= literally: finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution
= practices that conform to the laws of God

Node.gloss: to clear the guilty|to hold not guilty|to let one go unpunished
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities pronounce or consider a person innocent or cleared of wrongdoing and freed from punishment

Node.gloss: to clear the guilty|to hold not guilty|to let one go unpunished
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities pronounce or consider a person innocent or cleared of wrongdoing and freed from punishment
